titles.title: Providing for a conditional adjournment of the House of Representatives and a conditional recess or adjournment of the Senate.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 239 - 175 (Roll no. 334).
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 5/20/2008--Passed House without amendment. Declares that, when: (1) the House adjourns on the legislative day of Thursday, May 22 or 23, 2008, it stand adjourned until 2 p.m. on Tuesday, June 3, 2008; and (2) the Senate recesses or adjourns on any day from Thursday, May 22, 2008, through Friday, May 30, 2008, it stand recessed or adjourned until noon on Monday, June 2, 2008.
